description: Kuza is a social enterprise focused on empowering young agripreneurs in Kenya and beyond. Founded by a visionary couple, it leverages technology and microlearning to enhance agricultural practices and business acumen among youth. With a decentralized model, Kuza connects young entrepreneurs with farmers, fostering a supportive ecosystem that promotes agency, dignity, and choice. Their mission is to create sustainable impact by transforming agriculture into a viable business for the next generation.
name: Kuza One
